languages.text: Any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the wearer's single attacks inflict +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds if the target fails an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text: 装备者所有单发攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果，持续两轮。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the wearer's single attacks inflict +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds if the target fails an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 装备者所有单发攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时，目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果可叠加。

装备者所有单发攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、使用者の単発攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}はすべて、2ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}に+1スタックを加える。スタックする。
languages.original_text: Any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the wearer's single attacks inflict +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds if the target fails an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}に失敗した場合、着用者の単攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}すると2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}に1スタックを加える。この効果はスタックする。

ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定測定{/g}に失格した場合、着用者の単攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}はどれもが2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}に+1スタックを加える。スタックする。

languages.text: Cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de los ataques individuales del portador infligen +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} durante 2 asaltos si el objetivo no supera una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Percepción{/g}. Es acumulativo.

Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} de los ataques individuales del portador infligen +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} si el objetivo no supera una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}. languages.text: Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit den Einzelangriffen des Trägers bewirkt 2 Runden lang +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}, wenn das Ziel bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} scheitert. Stapelbar.

traits.locale_text: Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} mit den Einzelangriffen des Trägers fügen +1 Addition von {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g} für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} zu, falls das Ziel bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} scheitert. Addiert sich.

languages.text: Цель, получившая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} одиночной атакой персонажа, выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и в случае провала получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g} на 2 раунда. Эффект суммируется.
